data.label: Yandex SpeechKit
data.description: Yandex SpeechKit 允许应用程序开发人员使用 Yandex 语音技术：语音识别（语音转文本）和语音合成（文本转语音）。

data.label: Yandex SpeechKit
data.description: Yandex SpeechKit allows application developers to use Yandex speech technologies: speech recognition (Speech-to-Text) and speech synthesis (Text-to-Speech).
